name: Wukong
title: the Monkey King
shortBio: Wukong is a vastayan trickster who uses his strength, agility, and intelligence to confuse his opponents and gain the upper hand. After finding a lifelong friend in the warrior known as Master Yi, Wukong became the last student of the ancient martial art known as Wuju. Armed with an enchanted staff, Wukong seeks to prevent Ionia from falling to ruin.

skins.name: Volcanic Wukong
skins.description: A greater Infernal whose power is drawn from the molten rock bubbling beneath the earth, Wukong's rage causes mountains to split, lava to rain from the sky, and rivers to become blackened glass. Still, he will never back down from any challenge—and this, perhaps, will be the key to his defeat.

skins.name: General Wukong
skins.description: Once a mischievous scout, Wukong led his sworn brethren on a treacherous journey to the western hinterlands, where he attained martial enlightenment. Now promoted to the rank of general, he commands a host of fearsome warriors, destined to cleanse the realm of monsters and demons alike.

skins.name: Jade Dragon Wukong
skins.description: Imbued with the power of the legendary jade dragon, Wukong has honed his abilities to a razor sharp point.Though still headstrong and brash, his newfound power is undeniable—a worrying sign to his master, as the jade dragon carries a powerful curse...

skins.name: Underworld Wukong

chromas.name: Underworld Wukong

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2025 Doombots event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2025 Doombots event.

skins.description: Once a pupil of the martial arts, Wukong trained under his masters' strict traditions and doctrines. In him, Death saw limitless potential, and chose to claim the disregarded student for the underworld instead. Now, Wukong fights alongside the undying hordes, no longer bound by the rules of the living.

skins.name: Radiant Wukong
skins.description: An ascendant being of nearly limitless power, Radiant Wukong has undertaken a great journey to test his skills against history's greatest warriors. However, overcoming his quick temper and impulsive nature might be his greatest challenge yet.

skins.name: Lancer Stratus Wukong
skins.description: Another of the ancient, mechanized Lancer units, Wukong arises from his dusty slumber in times of extreme danger, protecting the outland city-states from the most dire threats. Once these foes are eliminated he returns to the earth, an enigma older than recorded history.

skins.name: Battle Academia Wukong

chromas.name: Battle Academia Wukong

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: A consummate troublemaker and prankster, Wukong has failed out of every high school in the region, eventually washing out into Labrys as an 'enrollment of last resort'. A naturally gifted fighter in the Battle Club, he still hasn't learned discipline, and only listens to Caitlyn because she can beat him up.

skins.name: Elderwood Wukong

chromas.name: Elderwood Wukong

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: A protector with no one left to protect, Wukong torments any creatures who dare traverse within the Elderwood's depths. After the Coven destroyed his village in search of his enchanted staff's limitless power, he learned that trust is a fool's luxury. The gleam from his weapon's crystals serve as a constant reminder of the ancient trickster's failure.

skins.name: Mecha Kingdoms Wukong

chromas.name: Mecha Kingdoms Wukong

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2025.

skins.description: Tales of this traveling trickster's skill as a fighter reached the ears of the former Vercentian general, Darius. Believing that martial prowess made for the finest Avalon pilots, Darius recruited him and set to work honing his quick instincts for the cockpit. Wukong's talent promises untold glory—so long as his superiors can tolerate his mischief.

passive.name: Stone Skin
passive.description: Wukong gains stacking armor and max health regeneration while fighting champions and monsters.

spells.name: Crushing Blow
spells.description: Wukong's next attack gains attack range, deals bonus damage, and reduces the target's armor for a few seconds.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Wukong and his Clone's next Attack gains @AttackRangeBonus@ range, deals an additional @BonusDamageTT@ physical damage, and removes @ArmorShredPercent*100@% Armor for @ShredDuration@ seconds.

This Ability's cooldown is reduced by @CooldownDecrease@ seconds every time Wukong or his Clone hit an enemy with an Attack or Ability.

This Ability triggers spell effects upon dealing damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Warrior Trickster
spells.description: Wukong becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font> and dashes in a direction, leaving behind a clone that will attack nearby enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Wukong dashes and becomes Invisible for @StealthDuration@ second, leaving behind a stationary Clone for @CloneDuration@ seconds.

The Clone Attacks nearby enemies Wukong has recently damaged and will mimic his ultimate, each dealing @CloneDamageMod*100@% of normal damage.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Nimbus Strike
spells.description: Wukong dashes to a targeted enemy and sends out images to attack enemies near his target, dealing damage to each enemy struck.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Wukong dashes to an enemy, sending out Clones that mimic the dash to up to @ExtraTargets@ additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes @TotalDamage@ magic damage. He and his Clone gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed for @AttackSpeedDuration@ seconds.

@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Cyclone
spells.description:
Wukong's extends his staff and spins it around repeatedly, gaining Move Speed.

Enemies struck take damage and are knocked up.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Wukong gains @MoveSpeed*100@% Move Speed and spins his staff, Knocking Up nearby enemies for @KnockupDuration@ seconds and take @TotalDamageTT@ plus @PercentHPDamageTT@ max Health physical damage over @SpinDuration@ seconds.

This Ability can be cast a second time within @RecastWindow@ seconds before going on cooldown.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
